home.title: About Me
home.aboutMe: Hi there and welcome to my revamped website! I'm a game developer working for Ubisoft Montreal. This website was made by taking a free Bootstrap template and replacing its logic with React. Gulp was the template's default package handler so I extended it to suppot JSX files. I hope you like this website!

CV.title: Curriculum Vitae
CV.description: This is a shortened form of my CV. If you want more details, you can send me an email and I'll send you my beautifully latexed version.

details.Bachelor of Science: Liberal CSC Anat. & Cell Biology and CSC Comp. Sci.
